price: Thuaj (o Muhamed!): “O njerëz, unë jam për ju vetëm paralajmërues i qartë”.
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qul yāayyuhā al-nāsu innamā anā lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
